section.title: Moving Test Cases to external Projects

anchor.xreflabel: Move Test Cases to an External Project

section.para: If you are reusing a Project or Projects in your currently opened Project (), you can move Test Cases you create to these reused Projects to make them a part of that Project.
This lets you add useful Test Cases to external libraries to be reused in other Projects.

listitem.para: In the Test Case Browser, select the Test Case, Test Cases or categories you want to move to an external Project that you are currently reusing in the open Project.
Right click on the selected items and select:
From the dialog which appears, select which reused Project to move them to.
The items you selected will appear in the blue colored category of the reused Project you selected and will disappear from their original place.
The structure of your Project stays the same â€“ the moved Test Cases are not deleted from places where you have reused them, for example.

section.para: If you move Test Cases containing referenced Test Cases from other Projects, make sure that the Project the Test Cases are dependent on is also reused in your external Project.
